title: Carefree Path of Dreams - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Horror   Martial Arts   Mystery   Supernatural   Xuanhuan
tags: Antihero Protagonist   Apathetic Protagonist   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Body Tempering   Calm Protagonist   Carefree Protagonist   Cautious Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cultivation   Cunning Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   Doctors   Dreams   Enemies Become Allies   Episodic   Evil Gods   Evil Protagonist   Famous Protagonist   Game Elements   Genius Protagonist   God Protagonist   Gods   Hidden Abilities   Human Experimentation   Inheritance   Kingdom Building   Kingdoms   Male Protagonist   Mature Protagonist   Multiple POV   Multiple Realms   Nationalism   Pragmatic Protagonist   Protagonist with Multiple Bodies   Racism   Reincarnation   Royalty   Ruthless Protagonist   Schemes And Conspiracies   Special Abilities   Strategist   Time Skip   Underestimated Protagonist   Unreliable Narrator   Wars   Weak to Strong   World Hopping   World Travel

description: This is the story of a boy who lives a secluded life in the mountains, tending to his farm, rearing his fish, and having dreams. Eh? Have I suddenly conquered all worlds and became the big boss? Or am I still in a dream?>
